description_for_human: A unified OpenAI-compatible relay exposing GPT-5, Sora-2-Pro, vector, realtime, and jobs endpoints. Supports text, audio, image, and video generation, plus tool orchestration and streaming.
description_for_model: An OpenAI-compatible API relay implementing the /v1/responses endpoint and tool system (video_generation, vector_store, audio, image, and realtime). Designed for GPT-5, Sora-2-Pro, and O-series models.

auth.instructions: Use your OpenAI-compatible API key in the Authorization header (e.g., Authorization: Bearer sk-...).

examples.name: Text Completion
examples.description: Generate a structured GPT-5 text response via the unified endpoint.
examples.curl: curl -X POST https://chatgpt-team-relay.onrender.com/v1/responses -H 'Authorization: Bearer sk-...' -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"model": "gpt-5-pro", "input": "Write a short poem about relay servers."}'

examples.name: Video Generation (Sora-2-Pro)
examples.description: Generate a cinematic 10-second clip using Sora 2 Pro.
examples.curl: curl -X POST https://chatgpt-team-relay.onrender.com/v1/responses -H 'Authorization: Bearer sk-...' -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"model": "gpt-5-pro", "input": "Create a 10-second drone shot of snowy mountains at sunrise.", "tools": [{"type": "video_generation", "model": "sora-2-pro", "parameters": {"seconds": 10, "size": "1920x1080"}}]}'

examples.name: Realtime Session
examples.description: Initialize a realtime GPT-5 session for text or audio.
